trends: There has been one other sighting in Wayne
There were no other sightings in Wayne on or around May 17th 2008
divs: sighting detailsas i was driving down rt23 southbound in wayne, nj approaching newark-pompton crossroad, a shiny object in the pale blue sky caught my attention. it was at an unknown distance\altitude and i could not see any specific shape to it. it looked like tiny sphere moving parallel with the ground. i kept my eyes on it for no more than five seconds when it seemed to literally shrink out of site in less than a second. it was moving about the speed of an airliner which is what i thought it was at first until i watched it vanish. i did not blink. it all happened so fast that it made me very curious but i had to concentrate on traffic and the red light coming up in front of me so i quickly forgot about it. it wasn't until i began to think about it several hours later when it occurred to me that i may have just witnessed a ufo. i suppose it is possible it was a jet that caught the sunlight at just the right angle and then turned in a way that caused it to lose its reflectiveness. however, the sky was completely clear in the area, both from clouds and obstructions. and as i scanned the same area of the sky and in the direction it was heading ten seconds later while i waited at the traffic light, i did not see any airplanes at all. since it happened so fast, i have some doubt as to whether i saw anything out of the ordinary at all, or just an optical illusion created by sunlight and a reflective surface. i will never know for sure.
Summary: shiny orb/object in sky vanished within seconds
